image 1920 1080
clear 255 255 0
color 0 0 0
line 0 0 1000 500
line 300 700 666 1000
polygon 3 300 300 300 900 666 666
color 255 0 255
fill 356 50
save reprovou4.ppm

image 1920 1080
clear 255 0 255
color 0 0 0
circle 500 500 100
fill 540 500
line 1000 700 1000 900
color 0 255 0
polygon 3 600 950 650 900 700 1000
fill 601 710
line 650 900 700 850
line 700 900 750 950
save vaidar.ppm
